lore: In the past, Nixes had a certain animosity toward the humans, and a great antagonism toward the Elves. After several centuries of war, they signed a peace treaty when Lister sent his Priests around the world.\n\nOut of all the surface Nixes, only Imposters still work for their people. Their objective is to find any men of their species who have escaped the underground cities to bring them back and have them suffer their deserved punishment: an unspeakable torture that lasts for a week.
menagerieDialog: Leave me alone. I must rest before we venture forth into a new Realm.
You should strive to be more efficient. There's no need to stop back at your castle between every single realm.
I hear you've got a problem that needs solved.
My blade is ready. Let's assassinate some kings.
This castle is so loud and overwhelming. I can't wait to get out of here.
name: Nix Imposter
